title: Nerf Darius NOW
body: Okay, so let me get this straight. Riot has made a champion that is beyond even considered broken. What goes through the minds of your champion balance team at Riot. Have you not even noticed what is happening here. He is so ridiculously overpowered in the game, that most of the people playing can't take it anymore. Take off his Q-heal and NERF HIS PASSIVE. Furthermore, one of the main reasons why he is so OP is the fact that he can use more than 1 ultimate ability. He is so unbelievably powerful, that almost no champion can go up against him. Not only have you made a champion that builds tank and does a ton of damage, but one that is so broken, that he actually ruins the game. Point of this is, NERF DARIUS NOW...
